definition: poor monk (humble term used by monk of himself)

sentences.english: Let this poor monk be the first to congratulate this future official.
sentences.chinese: 让贫僧做第一个向将来高官道喜的人吧。

sentences.english: Monk of deficient is Shaolin Temple abbot, law order nocturnal emission.
sentences.chinese: 贫僧乃少林寺方丈，法号梦遗。

definition: benefactor (term used by a monk to address a layperson)/donor (semiconductor)
(Buddhism) benefactor (designation of a lay person by a monk)
Amitabha Buddha/the Buddha of the Western paradise/may the lord Buddha preserve us!/merciful Buddha!
one of three fabled islands in Eastern sea, abode of immortals
square zhang (i.e. unit of area 10 feet square)/monastic room 10 feet square/Buddhist or Daoist abbot/abbot's chamber
lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
name in religion (of Buddhist or Daoist within monastery)
